title: First Jürgen, then Stephen, now me.
content:
My brand-spanking new Dutch-speaking [FontShop blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20060618115159/http:/www.fontshop.be/index.php) went live tonight. Occasionaly I might have French or English entries now and then, and English translations of my type tutorials will also be published on FontFeed.

Now that that’s taken care of, let’s get Typographer.org back on the rails.
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: So excited and I just can’t hide. I think I’m about to lose control and I think I like it.
Oh no, somebody call a doctor! Stewf is having a… _disco attack!_ :^D
